page.title: 02AFON BRADLEY FARM
page.content: THERE ARE 8 FARMS IN OUR AREA. WE CHOSE AFON BRADLEY FARM BECAUSE IT WAS ONE OF THE NEAREST TO GET TO.IT IS MANAGED BY A MOTHER AND HER SON. THEY WORK HARD. THEY KEEP 350 SHEEP AND HAVE ALSO JUST HAD 500 LAMBS.THEY DONT GROW ANY CROPS, ALL THE FARM IS GRASSLAND.THEY ALSO HAVE 7 COWS AND ONE BULL.THE FARM BELONGS TO THE FAMILY NOW, BUT LIKE A LOT OF THE LAND AROUND HERE, IT USED TO BELONG TO THE CHIRK CASTLE ESTATE.THERE ARE 7 FIELDS AND ALTOGETHER ABOUT 120 ACRES.ALL THE BUILDINGS ARE IN GOOD CONDITION.THE FARM IS LOOKED AFTER VERY WELL.THE FARMHOUSE ITSELF IS ABOUT 200 YEARS OLD.WHEN THE LAMBS ARE BIG ENOUGH,THEY WILL BE TAKEN TO BE SOLD AT EITHER RUTHIN MARKET OR OSWESTRY MARKET.
